committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend tile 39, United States Code, to authorize the United States Postal Service to cash United States Government checks for the public, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the United States Postal Service to cash U.S. Government checks.

titles.title: To amend tile 39, United States Code, to authorize the United States Postal Service to cash United States Government checks for the public, and for other purposes.
